resumeText:
JAMIE LEE
Frontend Developer | London, UK
jamie.lee@email.com | github.com/jamielee

EXPERIENCE

Frontend Developer — Pixel Studios Ltd (Sep 2021 – Present)
• Built responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
• Implemented design system with Storybook used across 3 product teams
• Improved Core Web Vitals scores by 40% through performance optimization
• Collaborated with UX designers to translate Figma mockups into pixel-perfect components

Junior Frontend Developer — WebWorks Agency (Jan 2019 – Aug 2021)
• Developed client websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js
• Built custom WordPress themes for 15+ small business clients
• Implemented responsive email templates with 98% client rendering compatibility

EDUCATION
BSc Computer Science — University of Manchester, 2018

SKILLS
React, TypeScript, JavaScript, Vue.js, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, Storybook, Figma, Git, Webpack, Vite, Jest, Cypress
jobDescriptionText:
Senior Frontend Engineer — DesignTech (Remote, UK)

About the Role:
Join our product team to lead frontend development for our design collaboration platform used by 100K+ designers worldwide.

Requirements:
• 4+ years of frontend development experience
• Expert in React and TypeScript
• Experience with Next.js and server-side rendering
• Strong CSS skills including animations and responsive design
• Experience with design systems and component libraries
• Performance optimization experience (Core Web Vitals)
• Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress, Playwright)
• Familiarity with GraphQL and REST APIs
• Experience with CI/CD and deployment pipelines

Nice to Have:
• Experience with WebGL or Canvas APIs
• Knowledge of accessibility standards (WCAG)
• Experience with micro-frontend architectures
• Contributions to open-source projects
